title: SOLD: T206 Ty Cobb Bat Off PSA 4 (Delaware Find)
author: wilkiebaby11

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Ty Cobb Bat Off PSA 4 (Delaware Find)
posts.post_content:
The Cobb was graded in March as part of the Delaware Find.

Cobb - $4100
besides a single way-OC psa 3 that keeps circulating at well below comps, PSA 3's have sold at $2337 and $2495.
PSA 4 has no recent comps in over 16 months when 4 of them went for $2750-$3763
last 6 PSA 5's have average'd $6050, with no recent comps in about 7 months.
